contextual_notes: The user has specific accessibility needs and budget constraints, which are critical to their satisfaction.
The user values timely responses and updates, which significantly impact their satisfaction levels.
general_insights: Timely and transparent communication is crucial in maintaining user satisfaction, especially when dealing with specific needs and expectations.
Acknowledging user preferences and providing immediate feedback can prevent decreases in satisfaction.
Providing a clear timeline or updates on progress can help manage user expectations and maintain trust.
